name: Swordrite
description:
Get ready to face foes in this unforgiving pixelish platformer game. We've all seen games like this, rogue-like/rogue-lite, metroidvania new borns.. they are fun. Fun as hell. Swordrite is no exception.

Swordrite launches on Steam with the following
  • Freedom of movement: walking, running, sprinting, crouching, sliding, climbing, ledge hanging
  • 3 Boss fights with interesting mechanics
  • Difficult jumping puzzles
  • Bow or sword as weapons
  • Leveling system with point attributes for combat diversity
